1.title: Business Aspects of Video/Film Production

episode of.title: North Lake College Video/Film Professional Forum (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Television and Video professionals in the DFW metroplex travel to North Lake College to share valuable advice and experience to the students regarding starting their own business, freelance work and how to get a job out of college.

2.title: Casting Panel

episode of.title: North Lake College Video/Film Professional Forum (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: North Lake College hosted a casting director, working actress, SAG rep, Mary Collins agency rep and Vice-President of Women in Film.Dallas at their bi-annual "North Lake College Video/Film Professional Forum".

3.title: Audio with Skip Frazee

episode of.title: North Lake College Video/Film Professional Forum (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Skip Frazee, a legend in the audio/sound business with 55 years of experience speaks with Andy Chiles, Director at North Lake College's Video Technology division. Frazee was Chiles mentor years ago and this intimate talk is very informative. Frazee is a member of SMPTE, AES, IATSE, and ACFEI. Frazee has won a "Grammy" and an "Emmy" and answers the questions of the North Lake College students during this talk. Frazee now owns Sound One and Forensic Sound and has much to offer concerning digital and the new domain.

akas: North Lake College Video/Film Professional Forum (United States)
